title: Lost season 4 border?
body: Although Season 4 is my first season playing league, and I mostly stick to normals, I managed to get to Silver 3 from the 13 ranked games I played this year. I was given the silver border/icon when they were given out in November, but after a week or so both the border and icon disappeared from my account, and as of writing this I have the default border and no rank icon. My rank is still Silver 3, and I did not go unranked from inactivity when the end of season rewards were given out. Why would this have happened? My account was on a two week ban during the end of the season, but not chat/ranked restricted, would that be the reason? I've never been chat/ranked restricted

replies.body: If you write in a ticket here (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) our support specialists will be able to assist you.

Holly I am starting this discussion and I hope you can participate and help me out.  I'm also wondering if this is the proper way to do these kinda of things.  Thank you for taking the time to view this.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/K0NzFhLV-rank-borders
